title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.11 - Monitoring and enforcement of timelines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.11 - Monitoring and enforcement of timelines

State Regulations

The department will monitor and investigate a hearing
officer's compliance with the timelines prescribed in Education Law section
3020-a. A record of continued failure to commence and complete hearings within
the time periods prescribed in this section shall be considered grounds for the
commissioner to exclude such individual from the list of potential hearing
officers for these hearings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-1.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
